page.title: 04A day in the life of.....
page.content: A Hurworth child - I get up at 7.30am for my breakfast.Later on I play with my Sindy horses.At 8.30am I let my three ponies Ted, Lily and Ginger out in the field.At 8.45am we go to school and then I play elastics.At 9.00am we go into the classroom and we do maths until 9.55am and then we do drama.At 10.30am it is playtime and I play elastics with my friends.We come in at 10.55am and we do Creative Writing till 11.50am, and then we go for our dinner.At 1.10pm we do Geography and at 2.50pm we play rounders in the hall.When it is 3.45pm we go home and I get changed and ride Ted, at 5pm I have my tea and then ride Lily and Ginger and at 7.45pm I have a bath, then I watch television before I go to bed.
